activities: ChannelAdvisor provides cloud-based e-commerce solutions that enable retailers and manufacturers to integrate, manage and optimize their merchandise sales across hundreds of online channels.  The types of personal information received by ChannelAdvisor and its controlled subsidiaries from the EU may include, but are not limited to: name, title, company name, physical address, e-mail address, telephone number, credit card information and username and password.  Due to the global nature of its activities, ChannelAdvisor may transfer personal data between members of the European Union and the United States and its controlled subsidiaries.  This certificate does not apply to the controlled subsidiary ChannelAdvisor AU.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
